author: vercel-release-bot
message:
Update Turbopack production test manifest (#81105)

This auto-generated PR updates the production integration test manifest used when testing Turbopack.

files.patch:
@@ -2017,10 +2017,10 @@

-      "Dynamic IO Errors - With Minification Sync Dynamic - With Fallback - Math.random() should not error the build when calling Math.random() if all dynamic access is inside a Suspense boundary",

+      "Dynamic IO Errors - Build Without --prerender-debug Sync Dynamic - With Fallback - Math.random() should not error the build when calling Math.random() if all dynamic access is inside a Suspense boundary",
